医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
提议“GREAT PLEA”系统在医疗保健领域负责任地使用生成式人工智能NPJ Digital Medicine 的一项研究回顾了人工智能在军事和医疗保健领域的伦理指南，提出了“GREAT PLEA”系统，以促进人工智能在临床研究中的伦理应用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/GREAT-PLEA-system-propose-for-responsible-use-of-generative-AI-in-healthcare.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/GREAT-PLEA-system-propose-for-responsible-use-of-generative-AI-in-healthcare.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d641094d-1687-493f-96e4-fbd6e86ac66b Tue, 05 Dec 2023 23:25:00 -0500 'GREAT PLEA' system proposed for responsible use of generative AI in healthcare
研究表明，不规则的睡眠模式与老年人认知能力下降有关研究发现，睡眠时间短和睡眠模式的高度可变性与老年人的认知障碍显着相关，这凸显了持续睡眠对认知健康的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/Irregular-sleep-patterns-linked-to-cognitive-decline-in-older-adults-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/Irregular-sleep-patterns-linked-to-cognitive-decline-in-older-adults-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=68b613d6-732f-48ea-8ee3-11f6b89c4c2f Tue, 05 Dec 2023 23:02:00 -0500 Irregular sleep patterns linked to cognitive decline in older adults, study shows
交感神经系统和免疫相互作用：代谢调节的关键《Advanced Science》的一篇评论探讨了免疫系统和交感神经系统在调节胰腺、肝脏和脂肪组织等重要代谢器官中的相互作用。这项全面的分析提供了对影响代谢的神经免疫关系的见解，为代谢疾病提供了潜在的新治疗策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/Sympathetic-nervous-system-and-immune-interplay-Key-to-metabolic-regulation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/Sympathetic-nervous-system-and-immune-interplay-Key-to-metabolic-regulation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d43db9ba-1966-44da-87cb-2bd54c1fee05 Tue, 05 Dec 2023 22:31:00 -0500 Sympathetic nervous system and immune interplay: Key to metabolic regulation
发现与冠状动脉钙化的新遗传联系，提供治疗见解《自然心血管研究》中的一项研究确定了两个与冠状动脉钙化 (CAC) 相关的新基因位点，CAC 是动脉粥样硬化和冠状动脉疾病的关键指标。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/New-genic-links-to-coronary-artery-calcification-uncovered-offering-treatment-insights.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/New-genic-links-to-coronary-artery-calcification-uncovered-offering-treatment-insights.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=30997e03-96ac-4b35-a410-5582aa7d9037 Tue, 05 Dec 2023 21:58:00 -0500 New genetic links to coronary artery calcification uncovered, offering treatment insights
地中海饮食与改善精子质量有关《营养》杂志上的一项研究发现，坚持地中海饮食与男性精子参数的改善呈正相关。这项涉及 300 名非肥胖男性的观察性横断面研究表明，对饮食的坚持程度越高，精子活力、形态、活力和数量越好，这表明饮食可能是男性生育能力的关键因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/Mediterranean-diet-linked-to-improved-sperm-quality.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/Mediterranean-diet-linked-to-improved-sperm-quality.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6ba3efd2-b9b4-46bd-b2ab-199205b2ee0b Tue, 05 Dec 2023 19:11:00 -0500 Mediterranean diet linked to improved sperm quality
研究挑战质子泵抑制剂与肾脏疾病风险之间的联系《科学报告》中的一项研究调查了质子泵抑制剂 (PPI) 和组胺 2 受体拮抗剂 (H2RA) 使用与慢性肾病 (CKD) 风险之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/Study-challenges-link- Between-proton-pump-inhibitors-and-kidney-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/Study-challenges-link- Between-proton-pump-inhibitors-and-kidney-disease-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e270b27b-7f6d-45ea-a11f-b8977b9ff96a Tue, 05 Dec 2023 19:00:00 -0500 Study challenges link between proton pump inhibitors and kidney disease risk
革命性的自折叠纳米级 MRI 试剂使癌症成像更加清晰研究推出了一种用于 MRI 的新型自折叠纳米级造影剂，可通过较低的钆负载增强肿瘤可视化并降低不良反应的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/Revolutionary-self-folding-nanoscale-MRI-agent-sharpens-cancer-imaging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/Revolutionary-self-folding-nanoscale-MRI-agent-sharpens-cancer-imaging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=333a0dfc-72be-4e30-8267-2eebb5c1a293 Tue, 05 Dec 2023 18:45:00 -0500 Revolutionary self-folding nanoscale MRI agent sharpens cancer imaging
新研究探讨肠道菌群失调与慢性疾病之间的联系研究探索了肠道菌群失调的生态原因及其与人类疾病的联系，揭示了受氧气和硝酸盐等宿主源性因素影响的肠道微生物群组成失衡如何导致各种慢性疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/Link- Between-gut-dysbiosis-and-chronic-diseases-explored-in-new-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/Link- Between-gut-dysbiosis-and-chronic-diseases-explored-in-new-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9066f26f-eefe-4f18-83b6-2d3daa892637 Tue, 05 Dec 2023 18:25:00 -0500 Link between gut dysbiosis and chronic diseases explored in new study
有心血管疾病家族史的人可能会受益于多吃油性鱼近亲患有心血管疾病的人可能会受益于多吃油性鱼类。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/Individuals-with-family-history-of-cardioangio-disease-may-benefit-from-eating-more-oily-fish.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/Individuals-with-family-history-of-cardioangio-disease-may-benefit-from-eating-more-oily-fish.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=85468ed7-aaf6-496b-9e85-ffdabc69c2d9 Tue, 05 Dec 2023 15:55:00 -0500 Individuals with family history of cardiovascular disease may benefit from eating more oily fish
研究可能揭示抵消高血压对认知影响的新方法美国国立卫生研究院支持的一项研究表明，大脑周围保护层内的免疫系统细胞的反应可能会导致慢性高血压患者的认知能力下降。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/Study-may-shed-light-on-new-ways-to-counteract-the-effects-of-high-blood-Pressure-on-cognition。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/Study-may-shed-light-on-new-ways-to-counteract-the-effects-of-high-blood-Pressure-on-cognition。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ce25dc2e-13e6-4f37-9755-453b4cd38b25 Tue, 05 Dec 2023 14:37:09 -0500 Study may shed light on new ways to counteract the effects of high blood pressure on cognition
